projects.description: This program uses the Quine-McCluskey Method to solve Karnaugh Maps (a common math problem for electrical engineers). The project is hosted on Amazon S3 as a static website where you can try the program yourself. You can also view the source code on github

Movie Hub is built using Angular 2 and uses themoviedb api to get the data for all the movie. Users can view popular movies and also if they are in theatres. Users can search for movies and also get links to the movie's main website. This website is also hosted using Amazon S3

A twitter clone built completely on the laravel 5.3 framework. Laravel is built on php and is used widely in the industry. The website has been hosted on heroku because I am poor. The source code is also available on github
